query.sentence: select moneda_garantia, sum(importe) as monto_total_garantias from ( select moneda_garantia, sum(gc.porcentajegarantia * gr.importecontractual) as importe from cre_garantiaclientes gc, cre_garantiasrecibidas gr, cre_clasgarantias cg where gc.cod_cliente=? and gr.caracter_garantia='G' and gc.num_garantia = gr.num_garantia and gr.pais_garantia = cg.pais_garantia and gr.tipogarantia = cg.tipogarantia and gr.subtipogarantia = cg.subtipogtia and gr.cod_subclagarantia = cg.cod_subcla_garantia and gc.TZ_LOCK = 0 and gr.TZ_LOCK = 0 and cg.TZ_LOCK = 0 and cg.autoliquidable='S' and not (cg.tipogarantia = 1 and cg.subtipogtia = 1) group by moneda_garantia union select moneda_garantia, sum(least(c1604*-1, importecontractual)) as importe from cre_garantiaclientes gc, cre_garantiasrecibidas gr, cre_clasgarantias cg, cre_garantiacredito gcre, saldos s where gc.cod_cliente=? and gr.caracter_garantia='E' and gc.num_garantia = gr.num_garantia and gr.pais_garantia = cg.pais_garantia and gr.tipogarantia = cg.tipogarantia and gr.subtipogarantia = cg.subtipogtia and gr.cod_subclagarantia = cg.cod_subcla_garantia and gr.num_garantia = gcre.num_garantia and gcre.jtsoid_saldo = s.jts_oid and gc.TZ_LOCK = 0 and gr.TZ_LOCK = 0 and cg.TZ_LOCK = 0 and cg.autoliquidable='S' and not (cg.tipogarantia = 1 and cg.subtipogtia = 1) group by moneda_garantia ) group by moneda_garantia

select lg.moneda as moneda, sum(lg.valor_realizacion) as garantiasRequeridas from cre_limite_garantia lg inner join cre_clasgarantias cg on cg.pais_garantia = lg.pais_garantia and cg.tipogarantia = lg.tipo_garantia and cg.subtipogtia = lg.subtipo_garantia and cg.TZ_LOCK = 0 and cg.cod_subcla_garantia = lg.subclasificacion_garantia where lg.id_limite = ? and lg.tipo = 'L' and lg.TZ_LOCK = 0 and cg.autoliquidable = 'S' group by moneda

select moneda, sum(C1604*-1) AS IMPORTE from SALDOS s INNER JOIN PRODUCTOS p ON s.PRODUCTO = p.C6250 and p.EVALUA_DEUDA='S' and p.TZ_LOCK = 0 where c1803=? and s.TZ_LOCK = 0 and JTS_OID not in (select JTS_OID_RENOVACION from CRE_SOLICITUDCREDITO sc where sc.TZ_LOCK = 0 and sc.TIPO_SOL_NUEVA_RENOVACION = 'R' and sc.estadosolicitud not in ('04', '21', '22', '23') and sc.CLIENTE = s.C1803) group by moneda

select cr.plazo AS PLAZO from cli_gruposeconomicoscliente gr INNER JOIN CRE_LIMITEGRUPO lim ON lim.grupo = gr.codigogrupoeconomico and gr.codigocliente = ? and lim.tz_lock = 0 and gr.tz_lock = 0 INNER JOIN cli_gruposeconomicos cligr ON cligr.codigogrupoeconomico = gr.codigogrupoeconomico and cligr.tz_lock = 0 INNER JOIN CRE_LIMITEGRUPO cr ON cr.idlimite = lim.idlimite and cr.tz_lock = 0

select moneda_garantia, sum(gr.importecontractual) GARANTIAS from cre_garantiapersonas gp, cre_garantiasrecibidas gr where tpo_persona='O' and num_persona=? and gr.TZ_LOCK = 0 and gp.TZ_LOCK = 0 and gp.num_garantia = gr.num_garantia and tipogarantia in ( select tg.tipo_garantia from cre_tiposgarantias tg where tg.tz_lock=0 and tipo_garantia_interno = 4) group by moneda_garantia

select (CASE WHEN pc.C6305 = 'D' THEN C1604 * -1 ELSE C1604 END) AS IMPORTE, C1601 AS CAPITALORIGINAL, c1608 AS INTERESES, s.moneda, s.jts_oid AS SALDO_JTS_OID, gr.codigogrupoeconomico AS GRUPO_ECONOMICO, lim.monto AS LIMITE, lim.moneda AS MONEDA_LIMITE, p.c6283 as FAMILIAPROD, s.c1803 as CLIENTE, s.c1642 as CUOTA_APROBADA from SALDOS s INNER JOIN PRODUCTOS p ON s.PRODUCTO = p.C6250 INNER JOIN PLANCTAS pc ON pc.C6326 = s.C1730 and pc.tz_lock = 0 and p.tz_lock = 0 and p.EVALUA_DEUDA = 'S' AND c1604 <0 AND s.tz_lock = 0 AND s.JTS_OID not in (select JTS_OID_RENOVACION from CRE_SOLICITUDCREDITO sc where sc.TZ_LOCK = 0 and sc.TIPO_SOL_NUEVA_RENOVACION = 'R' and sc.estadosolicitud not in ('04', '21', '22', '23') and sc.CLIENTE = s.C1803) INNER JOIN CLI_GRUPOSECONOMICOSCLIENTE gr ON gr.codigocliente = s.C1803 AND s.C1803 IN ( SELECT DISTINCT (CODIGOCLIENTE) FROM CLI_GRUPOSECONOMICOSCLIENTE WHERE CLI_GRUPOSECONOMICOSCLIENTE.TZ_LOCK = 0 AND CODIGOGRUPOECONOMICO IN (SELECT CODIGOGRUPOECONOMICO FROM CLI_GRUPOSECONOMICOSCLIENTE WHERE CLI_GRUPOSECONOMICOSCLIENTE.TZ_LOCK = 0 AND CODIGOCLIENTE = ?)) INNER JOIN CRE_LIMITEGRUPO lim ON lim.grupo = gr.codigogrupoeconomico WHERE lim.TZ_LOCK = 0 and gr.tz_lock = 0 ORDER BY gr.codigogrupoeconomico

select sol.montosolicitado AS IMPORTE, sol.numerosolicitud AS NUMERO_SOLICITUD, gr.codigogrupoeconomico AS GRUPO, lim.monto AS LIMITE, sol.moneda AS MONEDA, lim.moneda AS MONEDA_LIMITE, sol.CUOTAAPROBADA AS CUOTA_APROBADA from cli_gruposeconomicoscliente gr INNER JOIN CRE_LIMITEGRUPO lim ON lim.grupo = gr.codigogrupoeconomico and lim.tz_lock=0 and gr.tz_lock = 0 INNER JOIN cli_gruposeconomicos cligr ON cligr.codigogrupoeconomico = gr.codigogrupoeconomico and cligr.tz_lock = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN CRE_SOLICITUDCREDITO sol ON sol.cliente = gr.CODIGOCLIENTE AND sol.estadosolicitud NOT IN ('04', '21', '22', '23') and sol.tz_lock = 0
where gr.codigocliente IN (SELECT DISTINCT (CODIGOCLIENTE) FROM CLI_GRUPOSECONOMICOSCLIENTE WHERE CLI_GRUPOSECONOMICOSCLIENTE.TZ_LOCK = 0 AND CODIGOGRUPOECONOMICO IN (SELECT CODIGOGRUPOECONOMICO FROM CLI_GRUPOSECONOMICOSCLIENTE WHERE CODIGOCLIENTE = ? AND CLI_GRUPOSECONOMICOSCLIENTE.TZ_LOCK = 0))
select IMPORTE, CAPITAL_ORIGINAL, INTERESES, MONEDA, SALDO_JTS_OID, FAMILIAPROD, PRODUCTO, CUOTA_APROBADA, MATRICULA_LIMITE from VW_SaldosClienteLimite where cliente = ?
select IMPORTE, CAPITAL_ORIGINAL, INTERESES, MONEDA, SALDO_JTS_OID, FAMILIAPROD, PRODUCTO, CUOTA_APROBADA, MATRICULA_LIMITE from VW_SaldosClienteLimite where cliente = ?

select s.NumeroSolicitud AS NUMERO_SOLICITUD, CASE WHEN C6800 = 'L' THEN isnull(s.MONTO_TOTAL_DESGLOSE,0) ELSE s.montosolicitado END AS IMPORTE, s.moneda AS MONEDA, p.c6283 as FAMILIAPROD, p.C6250 AS PRODUCTO, s.CUOTAAPROBADA as CUOTA_APROBADA, s.MATRICULA from cre_solicitudcredito s, productos p where s.codproductosolicitado = p.C6250 and p.EVALUA_DEUDA = 'S' and p.tz_lock = 0 and s.tz_lock = 0 and s.estadosolicitud NOT IN ('04', '21', '22', '23') and cliente = ?

select s.NumeroSolicitud AS NUMERO_SOLICITUD, s.montosolicitado AS IMPORTE, s.moneda AS MONEDA, p.c6283 as FAMILIAPROD, p.C6250 AS PRODUCTO, s.CUOTAAPROBADA as CUOTA_APROBADA, s.MATRICULA from cre_solicitudcredito s, productos p where s.codproductosolicitado = p.C6250 and p.EVALUA_DEUDA = 'S' and p.tz_lock = 0 and s.tz_lock = 0 and s.estadosolicitud NOT IN ('04', '21', '22', '23') and cliente = ?

select ? AS NUMERO_SOLICITUD, ? AS IMPORTE, ? AS MONEDA, p.c6283 AS FAMILIAPROD, ? AS PRODUCTO, ? AS IMPORTE_CAPACIDAD, ? AS MATRICULA from productos p where p.C6250 = ? and p.EVALUA_DEUDA = 'S' and p.tz_lock = 0

select ? AS NUMERO_SOLICITUD, ? AS IMPORTE, ? AS MONEDA, p.c6283 AS FAMILIAPROD, ? AS PRODUCTO, ? AS IMPORTE_CAPACIDAD, ? AS MATRICULA from productos p where ? = p.C6250 and p.EVALUA_DEUDA = 'S' and p.tz_lock = 0

select porcentaje from cre_topes_individual where tz_lock = 0 and tipo_tope = 'I' and (residencia = ? OR residencia = 'X') and (calificacion_pais = ? or calificacion_pais = 'X') and (calificacion_cliente = ? or calificacion_cliente = 'X') and (intermediacion_financiera = ? or intermediacion_financiera = 'X') and (tipo_pj = ? or tipo_pj = 'X')

select distinct CODIGOCLIENTE from cli_gruposeconomicoscliente where codigogrupoeconomico in (select codigogrupoeconomico from cli_gruposeconomicoscliente where codigocliente = ? and tz_lock=0) and tz_lock=0

select rpn, rpn_actualizada_ajustada, capitalizaciones, dolar_mes_actual, dolar_mes_anterior, rpbb, disminucion_rpn, moneda_rpn from cre_resp_patrim where fecha_mes = ? and fecha_anio = ? and tz_lock=0

select cl.codigoresidencia, cl.intermediacionfinanciera, cl.calificacion_externa as califCliente, pj.tipoempresa as tipo_pj, p.calificacion as califPais from cli_clientes cl inner join cli_clientepersona cp on cl.codigocliente = cp.codigocliente and cp.titularidad = 'T' inner join cli_personasjuridicas pj on cp.numeropersona = pj.numeropersonajuridica inner join cli_paises p on pj.paisresidencia = p.codigopais where cl.codigocliente = ? and cp.tz_lock=0 and pj.tz_lock=0 and p.tz_lock=0
select moneda, sum(c1604) as monto from saldos s, cre_garantiasaldo gs where s.jts_oid=gs.jtsoid_saldo and s.tz_lock=0 and gs.tz_lock=0 and gs.num_garantia = ? group by moneda

select c.codigocliente from cli_clientes c, cli_segmentos s where s.tz_lock = 0 and c.tz_lock = 0 and s.cod_segmento = c.segmentocliente and (c.tipo = 'E' or (s.tipo_segmento in ('B','C'))) and c.codigocliente = ?
select s.moneda, sum(s.montosolicitado) AS IMPORTE from CRE_SOLICITUDCREDITO s where s.tz_lock = 0 and s.estadosolicitud not in (04, 21, 22, 23) and s.cliente = ? group by s.moneda
SELECT G.CODIGOGRUPOECONOMICO, G.CODIGOCLIENTE FROM CLI_GRUPOSECONOMICOSCLIENTE G WHERE CODIGOCLIENTE=?
select c.codigocliente,c.codigoGrupoEconomico from cli_gruposeconomicoscliente c where codigogrupoeconomico=?
select c.CODIGOCLIENTE, c.NUMEROPERSONA from cli_clientePersona c where codigocliente=?
select c.CODIGOCLIENTE, c.NUMEROPERSONA from cli_clientePersona c where NUMEROPERSONA=? and titularidad='T'

select nroGrupo,nrosolicitud, importemaximo,moneda from cre_sollicgrupo where nrogrupo=? and nrosolicitud = (SELECT max(nrosolicitud) FROM CRE_SOLLICgrupo where nrogrupo=? and FECHAVTO >= (select fechaproceso from parametros) )

SELECT CP.UNIPERSONAL AS UNIPERSONAL FROM CLI_CLIENTES CLI INNER JOIN CLI_CLIENTEPERSONA P ON CLI.CODIGOCLIENTE = P.CODIGOCLIENTE AND P.TITULARIDAD = 'T' INNER JOIN CLI_PERSONASFISICAS CP ON CP.NUMEROPERSONAFISICA = P.NUMEROPERSONA AND CLI.CODIGOCLIENTE = ?
SELECT S.C1803 AS CLIENTE, P.C6283 AS FAMILIA, S.MONEDA AS MONEDA FROM SALDOS S INNER JOIN PRODUCTOS P ON S.PRODUCTO = P.C6250 WHERE JTS_OID = ?
